/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, viewed from a high vantage point. The street, teeming with cars and buses, stretches out into the distance, flanked by towering buildings on both sides. The buildings, predominantly gray and white, rise high into the overcast sky, their windows reflecting the muted light of the day. A few red and blue accents punctuate the monochrome palette, adding a touch of vibrancy to the urban landscape. The perspective of the image, taken from above, provides a comprehensive view of the city's daily hustle and bustle. Despite the overcast sky, the city continues its ceaseless rhythm, undeterred and vibrant.
